transcript:
Executive: Namaskar, Mohan ko call karne ke liye dhanyavad.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Ji namaskar sir.
Executive: Aditya baat kar raha tha IndiaMARTed office se. PNS ke regarding call kiya tha sir.
Customer: Ji ji sir.
Executive: Wo aapne concern raise kiya tha na Pravesh ji ke pass new calls ka.
Executive: Wo maine check karaya ye jo ek to maine aapke check kiye jo 7 tarikh ko aapko jo calls aaye hue hain Priyam Jain ki. Correct sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ye aapke lead manager the inko block kiya gaya hai sir. Is vajah se inka calls aapke pass nahi aa pa raha hai.
Customer: Aisa hai?
Customer: Ab ye miscall aaye hain aur tab maine block kiya jab lagatar miscall ho rahe the aur mere pass call aa nahi raha tha tab ja ke maine block kiya hai.
Executive: Haan, kyunki wo aapka wo scammer wala hai na is vajah se.
Executive: Jaise jo jo kafi sare numbers aise hote hain na jo IndiaMART ke supplier list nikal ke call karte rehte hain. Scam wale. To ye wo number hai aapka is vajah se wo nahi gaya tha aur uske baad aapne block kiya to wo aapka completely close ho gaya us vajah se uski call nahi jayegi aapko.
Customer: Call nahi aayega wo to mujhe bhi pata hai.
Customer: Priyam Jain ka nahi jayega aapko.
Customer: Isko to maine block kiya hai aap isko to maine khud hi block kiya hai.
Executive: Kyunki do teen parameters hote hain jinke calls nahi jate hain. Pehla to ye Priyam Jain hai aapka jisko aapne block kar rakha hai.
Customer: Sir aapne kya batane ke liye call kiya hai mujhe?
Executive: Sir wahi do wahi batane ke liye call kiya hu jo telemarketers hote hain marketing wale scammers jo hote hain. Pehla unki call nahi jayegi aapke pass aur dusra jo.
Customer: Mera ye problem nahi hai bhai. Suniye meri baat. Mera ye problem nahi hai.
Customer: Problem ye hai ki call aata hai mere phone mein ring hota nahi hai aur application mein miscall show hota hai. Ye problem hai.
Executive: Haan sir. Wo telecallers hain jo scammers hote hain na is vajah se wo waha show karta hai aur aapke phone pe nahi aata hai.
Customer: Sir sir sir sir ek wo particular ho sakta hai uske alava bhi bahut sare hue hai na.
Executive: Baki aur jo aa rahe hain wo to phone pe aa rahe hain na sir jaise abhi main aapka dekh raha hu total 28 call gayi thi 28 mein se aapne 16 receive kiye the.
Customer: 28 mein se 16 receive kiya hai maine?
Executive: Haan 16 17 receive hue hain isme sir.
Customer: Usme usme mostly aise hain wo mere phone pe ring bhi nahi hua hai aur miscall ho gaya hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Aapko Pravesh ji ne problem samjhaya nahi hai kya kya concern hai mere ko? ji nahi bataya tabhi main call kiya sir ki phone mein ring nahi ho raha hai manager mein aa raha hai. main unko line pe leta hu line pe nahi baithe hain sir mere bagal mein hi baithe hain sir unse aap puchiye sir main kitne logo ko problem samjhata rahu please batao.
Executive: Main ek bar connect kar leta hu rukiye main aapko fir call karunga.
Customer: Aap unse samajh lijiye kya problem hai fir mujhe call kariye.
Executive: Okay sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's phone doesn't ring for incoming calls.

- Miscalls show in the application.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about telecallers and scammers.

- Executive mentioned customer received 16 calls out of 28.

- Executive offered to connect with Pravesh to understand issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after connecting with Pravesh.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- calls, ringing, application, telecallers
